name: World War II Online - PREMIUM
detailed_description:
You can enjoy the complete World War II Online experience with a Premium Subscription.

Start or continue your career in one or all the branches for your country and increase your rank along the way as you battle the enemy!

As the war progresses, your country and side will introduce newer equipment to the battle. As these more advanced items come to the front, you will have the opportunity to access this advanced weaponry and take the fight to the enemy!

Each piece of equipment has been modeled with information from historical data and official accounts of personal experiences from those who operated them during the time of war. You will not find a more engaging environment that simulates the war experience as close to realistic as the Premium Subscription of World War II Online!

By being a Premium Subscriber, you not only gain access to over 150 difference pieces of equipment, and you gain access to a larger variety of weapons and privileges of rank, including the following:

*Ability to earn higher player rank (Private to Lt. Colonel) in all personas
* Can become an important strategic part for your side through joining the High Command Officer and earning higher ranking due to your leadership ability (Colonel to Side Commander in Chief)
* Access to all Infantry weapons, paratroopers, tanks, trucks, artillery guns, in the Army persona
* Access to all fighters, bombers, ground vehicles and support troops in the Air Force persona
* Access to Destroyers, transports, riverine boats and marine forces in the Naval persona
* Create and take command of a squad with your friends
* Create and command missions to success

There is no better way to enhance your ability on the field than becoming a Premium Subscriber.

short_description: As a premium user, you will gain access to all that WWII Online has to offer! Take to the battlefield with iconic equipment to battle your foes! Join the High Command to shape the battle and take command of the battlefield!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“The battles that follow aren’t typical of most first-person action games.”
Warfare History Network

“an incredibly fun and long lasting game for any war gamer or history buff. ... you’ll still be playing this months, or even years, from now.”
8.4/10 – Game Chronicles

“it’s remarkably compulsive. The concept and the individual challenges are unique, and the sheer difficulty of it makes riding a tank for 20 miles peculiarly rewarding. ... there’s nothing else quite like it.”
4/5 – Games Radar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
